text: He Wanted Work is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * John Edwards as John Jackson * Mattie Edwards as Mandy * Billy Bowers as The Boss * Oliver Hardy as The Foreman (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Lost American films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: He Wanted Work
